channel.title: [PI] My Repair Snipet Won't Work

item.title: [PI] My Repair Snipet Won't Work
item.dc:creator: @sly_theft sly theft
item.description:
@sly_theft wrote:

case 549: int[][] repairable_items = {{ITEMID, COST, NEWITEM}}; for(int repair = 0; repair < repairable_items.length; repair++) { if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(repairable_items[repair][0])) { if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(repairable_items[repair][1])) { c.getItems().deleteItem(repairable_items[repair][0], 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(995, repairable_items[repair][1]); c.getItems().addItem(repairable_items[repair][2], 1); c.sendMessage("You have successfully repaired your armour."); } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have enough cash to repair that armour piece."); return; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have any repairable items at the moment."); return; } }

No matter what the cost is set at. It well display the message You do not have enough cash to repair that armour piece. Does anyone see whats wrong?

Read full topic
